  2. Girl groups
  3. Recipe

E.A.ZZU

Introduction

Recipe (Korean: 레시피) was a musical duo from South Korea, affiliated with Woori Entertainment. They launched their first digital single “Good, Bye Bye Bye” on November 16, 2015. They quietly split up in 2016.
